description:
Hirano Kouta is a 16-year old sophomore student who was often bullied in school, Kouta is a gun otaku and knows the ins and outs of the firearms and any military-related equipment that the group may comes across. At the beginning of the story he helped Takagi Saya escape danger, though only did so by following her orders. His skills as a marksman has proven to be an invaluable asset to keeping everyone alive. On a one-month trip to America he was trained by the US military contractor Blackwater USA which furthered his obsession over weapons.
His crush on Saya is one-sided as he on occasion tries to ask her out only to be rejected, but she has shown to care about him. His crush has since then, ended, and he had now developed deep feelings for police officer; Nakaoka Asami, in the most recent arc. With both parties holding mutual feelings, both expressed the love for the other, and Kouta managed to convince Asami to join the group in their escape. Before leaving the family mansion of Saya, her father entrusted her safety to him and Takashi. Takagi Saya has once mentioned that he and Takashi are the most likely to snap if things keep going the way they are. He`s grown very attached to Alice with whom he is often around playing with.
His character may have been based on the http://anidb.net/cr3564 [mangaka of the same name] as the two look similar.
name: Hirano Kouta
